title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 January 2013 - XWiki
content:
<tekzilla> has quit  
03:52 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
04:03 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
04:17 <rrodriguez> has quit  
11:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:18 <vmassol> has quit  
13:57 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
14:18 <qwebirc61621> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
16:54 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:55 <vmassol> has quit  
17:26 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:35 <vmassol> has quit  
17:57 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
18:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
19:58 <qwebirc61621> has quit  
21:08 <drsku> has joined #xwiki  
21:09 <drsku> Hi I am trying to start using  xwiki but when I click on download (W7) nothing happens. This is scary.  WTF?  
21:11 <cjd> Hi, nothing happens when you click the download link? let me take a look  
21:12 <cjd> ahh yes, OW2 is having some issues, let me get you a direct link.  
21:12 <cjd> did you want 4.4-rc-1 ?  
21:12 <drsku> yes  
21:14 <cjd> Here's a link from our own maven hosting: http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows/4.4-rc-1/xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows-4.4-rc-1.exe  
21:18 <drsku> Thanks. I am also new to IRC using mIRC. I am unable to copy and paste the link from it. Any idea how to get it? I cant imagine why this would not work.  
21:18 <sburjan`> drsku: double click on the link  
21:20 <drsku> OK I did not know this was a link  it looks like text. Surely people need to copy and paste from the IRC client.  Download has started.. Thanks so much and best wishes for 2013  
21:21 <cjd> happy new year  
21:45 <drsku> Total newbie. Trying to install 4.4-rc-1.exe. When the progress bar step is complete I click next and then get a blank screen. It has a next too but this does nothing. Have tried twice. WTF?  
21:48 <sdumitriu> drsku: Try usng the .zip package, the .exe isn't that well maintained. You should report a bug on jira.xwiki.org, though, so we'll remember to look at it  
21:49 <sdumitriu> The zip is here: http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/4.4-rc-1/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-4.4-rc-1.zip  
21:51 <drsku> I used a link sent to me by @cjd because I could not get a download to load from the download page. I  will try your link now  
21:57 <rrodriguez\_> has joined #xwiki  
22:01 <rrodriguez\_> is now known as <rrodriguez>  
22:06 <rrodriguez> has quit  
22:27 <drsku> has quit  
23:56 <drsku> has joined #xwiki
